getString

public java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String key,
                                  java.lang.String[] params)
Gets the value for the specified key. For every parameter on the params argument there must be an entry in the key value in the format {x} where x is the index of the value to be replaced on the formated string.

Parameters:
key - resource key.
params - parameters to be formated.
Returns:
the formated value.

getString

Gets the value for the specified key.

Parameters:

Returns:
String values associated to the key.

getData

public byte[] getData(java.lang.String key)
               throws java.io.IOException
Gets the binary data associated to the path set as value of the specified key.

Parameters:
key - resource key.
Returns:
the bytes of the binary data or null if key has no associated value.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - - If any error occurs.
